titleStmt.title: A remonstrance of the northern associations: communicating to the whole kingdome their miseries, desires and resolutions. Their miseries many. Their desires few. Their resolutions irrevocable.

notesStmt.note: The words "Their miseries Their desires Their resolutions" and "many. few. irrevocable." are bracketed together on title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
